name: picfactory
description: ChatGPT image generation automation desktop MVP

scripts.dev:electron: wait-on dist/main/main/index.js tcp:5173 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 electron dist/main/main/index.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:main && npm run build:renderer
scripts.pack: npm run prepare:browsers && npm run build && electron-builder -c.electronDist=node_modules/electron/dist
scripts.pack:mac: npm run prepare:browsers && npm run build && electron-builder --mac dmg zip -c.electronDist=node_modules/electron/dist
scripts.pack:update: npm run prepare:browsers && npm run build && electron-builder --mac dmg zip -c.electronDist=node_modules/electron/dist --publish never
scripts.pack:publish: npm run prepare:browsers && npm run build && electron-builder --mac dmg zip -c.electronDist=node_modules/electron/dist --publish always
scripts.pack:update:generic: (test -n "$PICFACTORY_PUBLISH_URL" || (echo "请先设置 PICFACTORY_PUBLISH_URL（更新服务器地址）" && exit 1)) && npm run prepare:browsers && npm run build && electron-builder --mac dmg zip -c.electronDist=node_modules/electron/dist --config.publish.provider=generic --config.publish.url=$PICFACTORY_PUBLISH_URL --publish never
